thread.title: Mama June Accused by Fans of Wearing a Fat Suit to Exaggerate Weight Loss on Reality Show
thread.title_full: Mama June Accused by Fans of Wearing a Fat Suit to Exaggerate Weight Loss on Reality Show

author: Jackie Willis
title: Mama June Accused by Fans of Wearing a Fat Suit to Exaggerate Weight Loss on Reality Show
text: Mama June Accused by Fans of Wearing a Fat Suit to Exaggerate Weight Loss on Reality Show by Jackie Willis 3:50   Playing Mama June Accused by Fans of Wearing a Fat Suit to Exaggerate Weight Loss on Reality Show Mama June Shannon's reality show is only one episode in , and already some viewers are starting to speculate about the 37-year-old reality star's appearance. After the premiere of WE tv's Mama June: From Not to Hot on Friday night, several fans took to social media to call out "before" scenes of Mama June, questioning whether she was wearing a fat suit and/or prosthetic makeup. WATCH: Mama June Reveals Reason Behind Shocking Weight Loss in From Not to Hot Premiere "If she isn't in a prosthetic fat suit, then why can't she turn her head? She is turning her whole body," one Twitter user commented. "It's obviously obvious that Mama June is wearing a fat face and suit for this show's confessional," another comment read. One viewer even accused the show of filming some of the confessionals after Mama June had reached her goal weight. "You can tell some 'before' surgery scenes were filmed after ... fake neck and much blonder hair," they noted. It's obviously obvious that Mama June is wearing a fat face and suit for this show's confessional ... ðŸ˜’ðŸ˜’ðŸ˜’ #MamaJune #wetv pic.twitter.com/boxKgADBdI â€” DEMAR DEMY PISHI (@DemarDemyPishi) February 25, 2017 It wasn't you Mama! Maybe the prosthetics turned him off. I mean, Gwyneth got Hal! #mamajune pic.twitter.com/uFqkp5UG5l â€” KT Thompson (@bbqblonde) February 25, 2017 Who does @WEtv & the makers of this show think they're fooling . That's a fat suit #MamaJune pic.twitter.com/sosWj3jw55 â€” RashanaÃ© Marie (@Therealnaemarie) February 25, 2017 When your fake fat chin won't stop peeling off ðŸ™„ @WEtv #MamaJune #HoneyBooboo pic.twitter.com/1AGk6cxZxL â€” Bravo Junkie (@Bravo_Junkie0) February 25, 2017 You can tell some 'before' surgery scenes were filmed after it (besides obvious weight loss) by fake neck & much blonder hair. #MamaJune â€” Kim (@KMorrison729) February 25, 2017 Mama June: From Not to Hot documents the reality star's so-called "revenge diet" that led to her dramatic physical transformation after her 2015 split from Mike "Sugar Bear" Thompson. EXCLUSIVE: Mama June, Now a Size 4, Enjoys Walking Around the House in 'Her Underwear,' Says Daughter Pumpkin In an exclusive interview with ET , Mama June's trainer, Kenya Crooks, along with her daughters, 17-year-old Lauryn "Pumpkin" Thompson and 11-year-old Alana "Honey Boo Boo" Thompson, revealed that the reality star is in hiding until the show's big reveal, and has to be in disguise if she goes out in public. "Even if she does go out, she has to be like suited up, big clothes on," Pumpkin disclosed. "I mean, she looks huge when she goes out." Check out more of ET's interview with Honey Boo Boo, Pumpkin and Crooks: RELATED SLIDESHOW
